testimonials.text: He can handle things quite nicely

Peter must be one of the most brilliant Government contractor I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best Macenary in no time!
